questionTitle: Be sure that everyone brings ____________ own book.
If anyone calls, tell ____________ that I'll be back in half an hour.
Joe and ____________ have been close friends for many years.
Did you see Derek and ____________ at the game?
Between you and ____________ , this politician cannot be trusted .
Each person in the room turned ____________ head to the front when the teacher entered .
We know that we can count on James, Anne, and ____________ .
Rhonda explained that ____________ andher sister had often eaten at that restaurant.
Most of the workers were wearing ____________ hard hats.
It's always best for a student to ask questions when ____________ doesn't understand a problem.
